name: RPBroadcastMP4ClipHandler
desc: An object that processes MP4 movie clips from ReplayKit.

items.name: func finishedProcessingMP4Clip(withUpdatedBroadcastConfiguration: RPBroadcastConfiguration?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Applies configuration update changes to the next MP4 movie clip.

items.name: func processMP4Clip(with: URL?, setupInfo: [String : NSObject]?, finished: Bool)
items.desc: Processes MP4 movie clips for a live broadcast.
